attributes.action: put pressure on Northumberland County Council to implement a 30mph speed limit in the village of Ridsdale, Northumberland as required under DfT guidelines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ridsdale is a rural village in Northumberland bisected by the A68 trunk road.  Our community has 31 children under the age of 16 who have no access any locally available outdoor recreation.
Despite Department for Transport guidelines (DfT Circular 1/2006 and TAL 1/04) requiring that all villages should be subject to a 30mph speed limit, Northumberland County Council refuses to implement such a limit.
